sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (RV_ID, RV_TITLE, CONT_TITLE, RV_DT, RV_CONTENT, USERS_ID, RV_MOD) values (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #rvTitle#, #contTitle#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY-MM-DD'), #rvContent#, #userId#, sysdate)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RV_TITLE = #rvTitle#, RV_CONTENT = #rvContent#, rv_mod = sysdate WHERE CONT_TITLE = #contTitle# and USERS_ID = #userId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONT_TITLE, USERS_ID, RV_TITLE, RV_CONTENT, RV_DT, RV_ID, RV_MOD from REVIEW order by rv_mod desc
SELECT RV_DT, USERS_ID, CONT_TITLE, RV_TITLE, RV_CONTENT, RV_ID FROM REVIEW WHERE users_id = #userId#
SELECT RV_DT, USERS_ID, CONT_TITLE, RV_TITLE, RV_CONTENT, RV_ID FROM REVIEW WHERE CONT_TITLE = #contTitle# and USERS_ID = #userId#
